titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Liechtenstein
Liechtenstein

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The archives are open to all people who can prove a valid interest in material stored there. Diplomatic records are generally available thirty years after creation.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Liechtensteinisches Landesarchiv, Städtle 51, FL-9490 Vaduz, Principality of Liechtenstein.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Diplomatic records can be found at the National Archives. Researchers should bring proof of identity and a letter from a sponsoring institution to the Archives’ reading room.
